root.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Sacred Cards
root.description: OverviewYu-Gi-Oh! The Sacred Cards is a card battling game developed and published by Konami for the Game Boy Advance platformStoryYu-Gi-Oh! The Sacred Cards is a game released for the GBA that portrayed a new duelist meeting the characters from the series, while fighting on the street against ordinary duelists. The main character finds strange men in black hoods, which are men hoping to take over the large dueling tournament hosted by Yugi Muto's archrival, Seto Kaiba. The story mainly revolves around the plot of season two of the popular children's anime, with the player joining Yugi, Joey, Tea, Tristan, and Bakura through their journey in Battle City. Franchise duelists such as Rex Raptor, Weevil Underwood, Mai Valentine, Mako Tsunami, Bones, and Bandit Keith also make appearances.Included Promo CardsYu-Gi-Oh! The Sacred Cards came with 3 physical Yu-Gi-Oh! cards packed inside. These cards included:Perfectly Ultimate Great MothRiryokuNegate Attack
